{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Thomson |model=TG787 |revision=(Technicolor) |est_release_date=08/2008 |fcc_date=06/20/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U46L088T20 |manuf_rev=LF |availability=EoL |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=RSE-TG784, H8NRTA1435VW |pwr_v=22 |pwr_amp=1.23 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU5162ETR-E3C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318;BCM4318KFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+, VoIP, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:26:44 |oui_eth=00:26:44 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Residential VoIP ADSL2+ Gateway}}
The Thomson TG787 is a WLAN VoIP ADSL2+ Gateway, offering 4x ethernet ports, :1x ADSL connector and 2x telephone connectors.
{{See also|Askey RTA1435VW|Technicolor}} :FCC ID: H8NRTA1435VW (2008-04-07) :''Askey RTA1435VW-D49_V4''
